casebody.data:
The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Eddie Perry, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 58024;First District (3rd Division)September 5, 1974.Paul Bradley and Robert E. Davison, both of State Appellant Defender’s Office, of Chicago, for appellant.Bernard Carey, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, for the People.

No opinion found. Click here to view source material.
